description:
"You guys want to do a little flip-flop action?"

"That would be fun!" JonahJonah said.

"I'm feeling it!" Trevor agreed.

We had decided that we were just going to let them do whatever they wanted. Both of them know what they like, so watching them go after it was pretty hot!

Trevor took control and after giving Jonah some slow, intense head, he fucked Jonah's ass hard.

Then it was Jonah's turn. Jonah eased into it by eating out Trevor's ass.

Then Jonah fucked Trevor until they both came, leaving one big, sweaty, lube-soaked mess!
title: Jonah & Trevor
